#define vipsharmavip
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int height[5002];
int dp[5002][5002];
int N;
int rec(int left , int right  ){
   if(left == right)
   return 0;
   if(dp[left][right] != -1 )
   return dp[left][right];
   int res  =  0;
   if( left < right ){
       if(height[right] <  height[left] )
        res = 1 + rec( right , left + 1 );
        res = max( res , rec( left  , right - 1 ) );
   }
   else{
        if(height[right] < height[left] )
        res = 1 + rec( right , left - 1 );
        res = max(res ,  rec( left , right + 1 ) );

   }

    return dp[left][right] = res;
}
int main(){
   cin.sync_with_stdio(false);
   memset(dp , -1 , sizeof dp );
       cin >> N;
      for(int i = 1 ; i <= N ; ++i )
         cin >> height[i];

         for(int i = 1 ; i <= N ; ++i )
           cout << max(rec(i , 1 )  , rec( i , N ) ) <<" ";
return 0;
}
